name: RedPeg Marketing
description:
We are an experiential marketing agency that specializes in creative conceptualization that enables brands to connect with their target audience in an authentic way. In the 20 years we've been in the game we've built a reputation that's known for engineering strategic brand experiences with excellent execution; attracting national and international clientele along the way. Our brand army stretches from coast to coast.
RedPeg HQ is located in Alexandria, VA just minutes from the White House & our west coast office is located in Los Angeles; Playa Vista to be exact. We actively seek out clients who are as committed to shaping culture and determining the future as we are. We excel in showing clients how to overcome barriers to innovation and get to market quickly with winning campaigns and initiatives for their business.
